00029   public: 
00032     EcalModuleCalibration():
00033       _createdObject( true )  {
00034       //create a generic object of variable size
00035       _obj = new LCGenericObjectImpl;
00036       _obj->setIntVal(kEcalModuleCalibrationIntNameLength,0);
00037       _obj->setIntVal(kEcalModuleCalibrationIntModuleID,INT_MAX);

00071     EcalModuleCalibration &setCalibrationConstant(UInt_t cell_index, float calibration_constant) 
00072 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00073       throw (std::range_error)
00074 #endif
00075     {
00076 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00077       if (cell_index>(UInt_t) getNFloat()) {
00078         throw std::range_error("EcalModuleCalibration::setCalibrationConstant> Cell index out of bounds!");
00079       }
00080 #endif
00081       _obj->setFloatVal(kNEcalModuleCalibrationFloats+cell_index,calibration_constant);
00082       return *this;
00083     };
00084     Float_t getCalibrationConstant(UInt_t cell_index) const
00085 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00086       throw (std::range_error)
00087 #endif
00088     {
00089 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00090       if (cell_index>(UInt_t) getNFloat()) {
00091         throw std::range_error("EcalModuleCalibration::getCalibrationConstant> Cell index out of bounds!");
00092       }
00093 #endif
00094       return _obj->getFloatVal(kNEcalModuleCalibrationFloats+cell_index);
00095     };
00096     
00097     UInt_t getNCells() const 
00098 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00099       throw (std::logic_error)
00100 #endif
00101     {
00102 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00103       if (getNFloat()<kNEcalModuleCalibrationFloats) {
00104         throw std::logic_error("The number of cells is negativ!");
00105       }
00106 #endif
00107       return (getNFloat()-kNEcalModuleCalibrationFloats);
00108     };

00130     EcalModuleCalibration(LCObject* obj) : 
00131       _createdObject(false)  {
00132       
00133       _obj = dynamic_cast<LCGenericObjectImpl*>( obj )  ;
00134       
00135       if( _obj==0 ){
00136 
00137         // could be an instance of EcalModuleCalibration !?
00138         EcalModuleCalibration* f = 
00139           dynamic_cast< EcalModuleCalibration* >( obj ) ;
00140 
00141         if( f != 0 )
00142           _obj = f->obj() ;
00143 
00144       }
00145 
00146       // do some sanity checks ...
00147       if( _obj==0 ){
00148         throw Exception("Cannot create EcalModuleCalibration from sth."
00149                         " that is not LCGenericObjectImpl" ) ;
00150       } 
00151       
00152       if(  ( _obj->getNInt()    < kNEcalModuleCalibrationInts )   || 
00153            ( _obj->getNFloat()  < kNEcalModuleCalibrationFloats)  ||
00154            ( _obj->getNDouble() != 0 )   ) {
00155 
00156         throw Exception("EcalModuleCalibration(LCObject* obj): Wrong number of elements in object" ) ;
00157       }
00158       // do more sanity checks
00159       // zero cells is permitted!
00160       if (_obj->getNFloat() < kNEcalModuleCalibrationFloats) {
00161         throw Exception("EcalModuleCalibration(LCObject* obj): Number of cells is negative." ) ;
00162       }
00163 
00164       UInt_t name_ints=getNeededInts(_obj->getIntVal(kEcalModuleCalibrationIntNameLength));
00165       if ( static_cast<UInt_t>( _obj->getNInt() ) != kNEcalModuleCalibrationInts+name_ints ) {
00166         throw Exception("EcalModuleCalibration(LCObject* obj): The number of integers (including encoded string differs from the expectation." ) ;
00167       }
00168 
00169     }
